com.samysadi.acs.service.checkpointing.checkpoint

Class VmCheckpointDefault

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samysadi.acs.core.notifications.NotifierImpl
      • com.samysadi.acs.core.tracing.ProbedImpl
        • com.samysadi.acs.core.entity.EntityImpl
          • com.samysadi.acs.service.checkpointing.checkpoint.CheckpointAbstract<VirtualMachine,Host>
            • com.samysadi.acs.service.checkpointing.checkpoint.VmCheckpointAbstract
              • com.samysadi.acs.service.checkpointing.checkpoint.VmCheckpointDefault
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Entity, UncloneableEntity, Notifier, Probed, Checkpoint<VirtualMachine,Host>, VmCheckpoint, Cloneable

    public class VmCheckpointDefault
extends VmCheckpointAbstract
    This implementation relies on its configuration.
    Following configuration values can be set:
    • UpdateOverhead in Simulator.MI. Indicates the computing overhead which is added during the checkpoint update. Default value is 0;
    • UpdateOverheadIsBlocking a boolean indicating if the checkpointed virtual machine should be paused when computing for the update overhead. Default value is true;
    • CompressionRatio a floating point value indicating the compression ratio. The greater the value is, the more the compression is effective. Default value is 1.0 which indicates that there is no applied compression (ie: compressionRatio * compressedSize = uncompressedSize);
    • IsLiveUpdate a boolean indicating whether the checkpoint updates should be live. A live update contains a memory pre-copy phase where the virtual machine is not paused. After, the pre-copy phase, the virtual machine is paused and a final phase where it is paused is engaged. Enabling live update, may reduce the pause time of the virtual machine during the checkpoint. Default value is true;
    • LiveUpdateMemoryBlockSize in Simulator.MEBIBYTE. Indicates the memory block size during the pre-copy phase of the update. Default value is 10 mebibytes;
    • LiveUpdateMaximumIterations indicates the maximum number of iterations before the pre-copy phase ends, and the final phase is engaged. Default value is 5;
    • LiveUpdateProgressThreshold in Simulator.MEBIBYTE. During pre-copy phase, if no progress is made, the final phase is engaged where the virtual machine is paused. This value is used to determine if progress is done or not. Default value is 10 mebibytes;
    • RecoveryOverhead in Simulator.MI. Indicates the computing overhead which is added during the recovery process. Default value is 0;
    • EnableStorageOperations a boolean indicating whether the checkpoint should simulate storage operations when accessing disk files. Default value is false.
    Since:
    1.2
